title: Inside the Mind of 'Mindhunter' Star Jonathan Groff (Ep. 197)
description:
The Ringer’s Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald chat with 'Mindhunter' star Jonathan Groff about his time on set with acclaimed director David Fincher; his character, Holden Ford; and the challenge of filming year-round. 

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
